article: Traditional Chinese doctors believe we need a balance of and to  be healthy  For example, are you often weak and tired? Maybe you have  too much  You should eat hot foods, like beef. As for me, I exercise every day, usually when I come home from school. My  eating  habits are pretty good ,I try to eat a lot of vegetables. I eat fruit and drink milk every day.I never drink  coffee  .Of course, I love junk food too ,but I try to eat it only  once a week  .Oh, and I sleep  nine hours every night  .So you see ,I look after my health .And my healthy lifestyle  helps me get good grades  . Good food and  exercise  help me to study better.
